title: BREAKING: Police Curfew imposed for Colombo South, North, and Central
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police Curfew imposed with immediate effect until further notice for Colombo South, North, and Central Police areas.
This was after ugly clashes broke out between pro-government supporters and peaceful protestors at the GotaGoGama and MynaGoGama protest sites.
Several tents set up at GotaGoGama protest site have been dismantled by a group that attacked MynaGoGama and then proceeded to GotaGoGama
Human Rights Commission condemns violence on peaceful protests, and police inaction
BREAKING: Police Curfew imposed for Colombo South, North, and Central
